name: Sasu Luhtala
description: I am a full-stack programmer interested in solving problems, visualization, user-experience and climbing. As a student at Hive Helsinki (one of the top coding schools in the world) I believe that solid fundamentals and deep understanding is what thrives success in long term and helps adapting new tools and technologies. I have projects done with C, C++, PHP and Javascript but I also have a grasp with HTML, CSS, React and Node.js.
